conbody.p: The <xref> element is rendered using either a MiramoXML <XRefDef> format definition (for cross-references to targets within the same publication, i.e. internal cross-references) or using the <HyperCmd> element (for external links to other PDFs or URLs, where the @scope attribute is set to 'external' or @format is 'html' or 'pdf').
Cross-reference targets may be specified using either URI based addressing (@href) or indirect key-based addressing (@keyref).
For internal cross references, setting the mmpdf:showProperties build parameter to Y will display the name of the XRefDef used to render the <xref> element to PDF.
The default mapping of the <xref> element may be overridden in a custom plugin - see and in particular the addCustomXRefDefAttributes extension template for more information.
